players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I have important information: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep the town safe."
You: "Charlie, that's a serious accusation. Can you explain why you believe Bob is the mafioso?"
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night instead of claiming to know my role immediately? That seems suspicious."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and can confirm he is mafia. I revealed it now to save time and protect the town. We must vote him out before he kills again."
You: "Bob's silence and deflection make me uneasy, but Charlie's quick reveal is also suspicious. We should consider all angles carefully before voting."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me instead of Diana? You'd have no reason to suspect me on night one. You're lying to get me voted out."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
